statements: UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = 10.50, status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00', receiver_address = 'xyz123' WHERE transaction_hash = 'abc987654321';
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET status='completed' WHERE transaction_id=1001;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount=25.75, sender_address='123abc', receiver_address='789xyz' WHERE transaction_id=1002;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = 100.25 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE network_activity SET activity_timestamp = '2022-01-20 12:30:00' WHERE activity_id = '987e6543-21b9-32d1-b654-675214611111';
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = amount + 100, transaction_timestamp = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE network_activity SET activity_data = '{"status": "completed", "message": "Transaction successful"}', activity_timestamp = NOW() WHERE activity_id = '98765432-abcdef-9876-5432-abcdef123456';
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = 5000.50 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE network_activity SET action = 'Connect' WHERE activity_id = 100;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET receiver_address = 'updated_receiver_address' WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE network_activity SET sender_ip = 'new_sender_ip', receiver_ip = 'new_receiver_ip' WHERE activity_id = 5678;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '79d2512b-97ad-45b9-a63b-3d71f23e0b80';
UPDATE blocks SET block_size = 512, timestamp = '2022-01-15 14:30:00' WHERE block_id = '0f19298b-f7d6-4e7d-b684-39f71f89d4c5';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, timestamp = '2022-09-15 12:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE blocks SET block_size = 500, block_hash = '0x9f8b153607aacf1285d175fe5724a02267686926', timestamp = '2022-09-16 08:45:00' WHERE block_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = 500.25, timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE transaction_status SET status = 'completed', update_time = '2022-01-15 12:45:00' WHERE status_id = 2001;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET receiver_address = 'new_receiver_address' WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE user_accounts SET email = 'new_email@example.com', created_at = '2023-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 5;
